title: invalid literal for int() with base 10: '47001\r\n47001'
body:
## Component Versions

Please at least fill in the release version and GUI or CLI version.

- **Video2X release version**:
- **Upscaler version**:
- **GUI version**: 2.8.1
- **CLI version**:

## Symptom

I get an error when trying to start the upscale on default settings

## Error Log or Screenshots

https://pastebin.com/k2VSgPB9

```
[32m[+] INFO: Loading files into processing queue[0m
```
